meanings.definition: A person who collects or tells anecdotes.
meanings.sent1: The group of anecdotalists shared funny stories at the party.
meanings.sent2: Anecdotalists often have a wide collection of interesting tales.
meanings.sent3: The anecdotalists' storytelling skills made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: She was a true anecdotalist, weaving captivating narratives.
meanings.sent5: The room lit up as the anecdotalist began recounting her adventures.

meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of anecdotes.
meanings.sent1: The book was filled with anecdotalist stories from the past.
meanings.sent2: Her writing style was very anecdotalist, focusing on personal experiences.
meanings.sent3: The anecdotalist approach added a unique charm to the documentary.
meanings.sent4: His speech was anecdotalist, painting vivid pictures of the past.
meanings.sent5: The movie had an anecdotalist feel, drawing viewers into personal tales.
